segments.pli: “Pañcahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato upāsako upāsakacaṇḍālo ca hoti upāsakamalañca upāsakapatikuṭṭho ca.
segments.en: “Mendicants, a lay follower with five qualities is an outcaste, a stain, and a reject among lay followers.

segments.pli: kotūhalamaṅgaliko hoti, maṅgalaṃ pacceti no kammaṃ;
segments.en: They practice noisy, superstitious rites, believing in omens rather than deeds.
They seek outside of the Buddhist community for those worthy of religious donations.
And they make offerings there first.

segments.pli: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahi dhammehi samannāgato upāsako upāsakacaṇḍālo ca hoti upāsakamalañca upāsakapatikuṭṭho ca.
segments.en: A lay follower with these five qualities is an outcaste, a stain, and a reject among lay followers.

segments.pli: Pañcahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato upāsako upāsakaratanañca hoti upāsakapadumañca upāsakapuṇḍarīkañca.
segments.en: A lay follower with five qualities is a gem, a pink lotus, and a white lotus among lay followers.

segments.pli: akotūhalamaṅgaliko hoti, kammaṃ pacceti no maṅgalaṃ;
segments.en: They don’t practice noisy, superstitious rites, and believe in deeds rather than omens.
They don’t seek outside of the Buddhist community for those worthy of religious donations.
And they don’t make offerings there first.

segments.pli: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahi dhammehi samannāgato upāsako upāsakaratanañca hoti upāsakapadumañca upāsakapuṇḍarīkañcā”ti.
segments.en: A lay follower with these five qualities is a gem, a pink lotus, and a white lotus among lay followers.”
